name: Newfie Bacon-Wrapped Shrimp
author: BJKRISTA7
summary: This recipe was introduced to my family by my Newfie brother-in-law! It has become a staple at family finger food night! Goes fast!
ingredients: ½ (6 ounce) box chicken-flavored dry bread stuffing mix
18  cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Boil water with butter in a saucepan; stir in stuffing mix
Remove saucepan from heat, cover, and let stand for 5 minutes
Place about 1 teaspoon stuffing on end of each strip, top with a shrimp, and roll up
Place bacon wraps on prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is crisp, about 30 minutes
Remove with tongs to a paper towel-lined plate to cool slightly before serving, about 2 minutes
